content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received an error message when trying to execute the shell command "feh output.png". The error message stated that "feh" was not found. I then sent a command to my computer to install "imagemagick" using the "execute_shell" command with the argument "sudo apt-get install -yq imagemagick".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Reading package lists...\\nBuilding dependency tree...\\nReading state information...\\nimagemagick is already the newest version (8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3+deb11u1).\\n0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 8 not upgraded.\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "display output.png"}}}'}]
"""
